item.description:
There will be a meeting to discuss the topics covered at the
U of H Campaign School meetup meeting last week. This will
be the first meeting to launch our campaign plans and to discuss
and determine what to do next regarding anchor events and
funding of our efforts. We will make an attempt to bring
members up to speed regarding the Official campaign strategy.
If you haven't done so already be prepared to sign a non-disclosure
agreement as it will be a prerequisite to any involvement at the meeting.

This will be the first of many Ron Paul Organizational meetings
necessary to achieving a successful Presidential Campaign in
Connecticut's Tolland County.

Sorry for the Short Notice. If necessary we will arrange a make-up
meeting for those who can not attend this Thursday Evening.
Please bring your Campaign binder and plan on taking notes.

Hope to see some new faces. Please e-mail me for my home address
if you plan on attending. - danderson12(at)snet.net

Regards,
Dave A.
item.name: Preliminary Campaign Organizational Meeting
